titleStmt.title: The taking of the royall galley of Naunts in Brittaine, from the Spanyards and Leaguers, with the releasement of 153 galley slaues, that were in her by Iohn Bilbrough, prentice of London, in Nouember last.
titleStmt.author: Bilbrough, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Richard Oliffe, and are to bee sould at his shop, in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Crane
